item.title: Video editing - Upwork
item.description:
Job Description
We are looking for a productive and enthusiastic Video and Photo Content Editor with amazing skills at creating graphics and content for our clients to join our team. This role involves creating ads and working with clients to establish their vision for the type of content they want to create. A strong sense of design and creativity is needed to create content that our clients love. Your work will involve editing and revising content, getting to know clients' needs, and making sure that your content is delivered on time and in the style and feel that aligns with our client's brands.

About Us
At Tulen Agency, we are driven by a simple yet powerful belief: to help great hospitality companies share exceptional hospitality experiences today. Hospitality isn't just a product to us. We see it as a way to build connections with the community, help uplift local economies, and provide escapes from the every day for normal people. By enhancing these experiences, we are contributing to a world that values great hospitality. Our goal each day is to assist one more venue than we did before.

Responsibilities
Create and edit video ads for clients
Create and edit photos and graphics for clients
Create slide decks for clients' event venues to explain their venues.
Work closely with our team to ensure smooth and effective timelines for ads.
Maintain a high level of professionalism and hospitality in all communications.

Requirements
Minimum of two years of experience in video editing.
Hospitality industry experience is a plus but not required.
Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal.
Ability to work independently in a remote setting.
Strong video editing skills and portfolio
Understanding of ad creatives and how to create wining ads for paid ad platforms like facebook instagram and google (youtube)

Perks
Work from the comfort of your home.
Join a passionate team that values hospitality and making a difference.
Extremely hard working team with great values.

Application Question(s)
Why are you applying for this job? Please write a detailed paragraph describing your current work situation and why you're interested in this position. (Applications that do not answer this question will not be considered).
Are you the type of person that loves hard work and to be busy this will not be easy but it will be rewarding! Describe if this is who you are and what drives you to work hard and like to be busy?

Experience
Video editing and graphic design: 2 years (Required)
Hospitality Industry (Preferred)


We are excited to hear from candidates who share our passion for hospitality and are eager to make a significant impact in the restaurant industry. If you are looking for a role where your efforts directly contribute to enhancing hospitality experiences, we encourage you to apply.


Hourly Range: $15.00-$45.00

item.title: Photo and Video Editing Specialist for Website and Social Media Content - Upwork
item.description:
HomeHive LLC is seeking a talented and creative Photo and Video Editing Specialist to join our team. The ideal candidate will have a keen eye for detail and a passion for creating visually appealing content to be posted on our website and various social media platforms, including Instagram.

Responsibilities:

Edit and enhance photos and videos for optimal clarity and attractiveness.
Apply company watermarks and logos to all media content.
Ensure consistency in style, tone, and quality across all photos and videos.
Collaborate with our team to understand the specific services depicted in each file and ensure the media accurately represents these services.
Manage and organize media files on our company server.
Deliver final edited photos and videos in appropriate formats for website and social media use.
Provide a finalized photo and video ready for posting every day.


Requirements:

Proven experience in photo and video editing.
Proficiency in editing software such as Adobe Photoshop, Lightroom, Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, or similar tools.
Strong understanding of social media trends and best practices, particularly for Instagram and TikTok.
Attention to detail and a strong aesthetic sense.
Ability to work independently and meet deadlines.
Excellent communication and organizational skills.
Preferred Qualifications:

Experience in branding and applying watermarks.
Portfolio showcasing previous work in photo and video editing, particularly for social media.

Conditions:

The deadline for the completion of all deliverables is July 1, 2024.
The specialist must provide a finalized photo and video ready for posting every day.

About Us:

HomeHive LLC is a company dedicated to providing top-notch services in the Houses and building maintenance and providing technical services. We pride ourselves on our high-quality media content which accurately reflects our brand and services.

Additional Information:

All photos and videos are the property of HomeHive LLC and have been taken by our company. We hold all rights and reserves on our media.
The media content is stored on our company server, and access will be provided to the hired specialist.

How to Apply:

Interested candidates are invited to submit their resume, a cover letter, and a portfolio of their previous work, particularly highlighting any relevant experience with social media content. (Applying randomly  will be ignored).

We look forward to seeing your creative work and welcoming you to the HomeHive LLC team!







Budget: $100

Title: Full-Time Short-Form Content Editors/Graphic Designers
Description: We are a leading social media agency specializing in the mass distribution of short-form content for creators, coaches, streamers, and podcasts. Our mission is to flood social media with our clients' content, creating fan and alternate accounts to amplify their presence and achieve massive organic exposure and reach. We are looking for skilled editors to join our team and help us produce engaging, retention-focused short-form videos.
Role Overview: We are seeking highly skilled Short-Form Content Editors/Graphic Designers to join our team full-time. The ideal candidates will have expertise in creating engaging, retention-focused short-form video content and be up-to-date with the latest editing trends and standards. You will work on mass-producing clips for creators, coaches, and podcasts, utilizing audio and visual hooks and engagement tricks. Additionally, you will create simple but effective thumbnails for the videos.
Key Responsibilities:
Edit short-form videos that are engaging and retention-focused for various clients including creators, coaches, and podcasts.
Utilize the latest editing trends, audio, and visual hooks, and engagement tricks to maximize viewer retention.
Collaborate with the creative team to develop and implement ideas for repurposing existing content into viral clips.
Create simple yet effective thumbnails for videos to enhance click-through rates and viewer engagement.
Ensure all content aligns with clients' brands and voice while maximizing its potential for virality.
Stay up-to-date with the latest trends in video editing, social media, and content creation to keep our strategies fresh and effective.
Manage multiple projects simultaneously, ensuring timely delivery of high-quality content.
Continuously improve editing techniques based on performance metrics and feedback.
Qualifications:
Proven experience as a video editor, particularly in short-form content creation.
Strong understanding of social media platforms (TikTok, Instagram Reels, YouTube Shorts, etc.) and their content trends.
Proficiency in video editing software (Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, After Effects, etc.).
Ability to create simple and effective thumbnails using graphic design tools (Photoshop, Illustrator, Canva, etc.).
Strong understanding of audio and visual hooks and engagement techniques.
Excellent communication and collaboration skills.
Ability to manage multiple projects and deliver high-quality content under tight deadlines.
Creative mindset with the ability to think outside the box and innovate.
Bachelor's degree in Film Production, Graphic Design, or a related field is preferred.
What We Offer:
Competitive salary.
Opportunity to work with a diverse and talented team on cutting-edge social media marketing strategies.
Access to the latest tools and technologies in video editing and content creation.
Professional development and growth opportunities in a rapidly expanding company.
Be part of a company poised to become a top 500 player in the industry.

If we determine you are competent for the role, we will schedule a 30-minute call to understand your background and strategize on how you can become a valuable asset to our team.
How to Apply: Submit a quick summary of why you are qualified for the position as well as any resume, and relevant portfolio or work samples through.
